parameters.content:
# üìä –ê–ù–ê–õ–ò–¢–ò–ö–ê –î–ò–ê–õ–û–ì–û–í



## ‚öôÔ∏è –ù–ê–°–¢–†–û–ô–ö–ê



### 1Ô∏è‚É£ –ù–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π—Ç–µ —É–∑–µ–ª ¬´‚öôÔ∏è CONFIG¬ª

–û—Ç–∫—Ä–æ–π—Ç–µ –∏ –Ω–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π—Ç–µ –ø–∞—Ä–∞–º–µ—Ç—Ä—ã:



**üîë –ê–≤—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏—è:**

‚Ä¢ `api_key` ‚Äî –í–∞—à API –∫–ª—é—á

‚Ä¢ `rate_limit_max` ‚Äî –õ–∏–º–∏—Ç –∑–∞–ø—Ä–æ—Å–æ–≤/–º–∏–Ω



**üóÑÔ∏è –¢–∞–±–ª–∏—Ü—ã –±–∞–∑—ã –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö:**

‚Ä¢ `table_analysis_settings` ‚Äî –ù–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∏ —è–∑—ã–∫–∞ –∞–Ω–∞–ª–∏–∑–∞

‚Ä¢ `table_dialog_analysis` ‚Äî –†–µ–∑—É–ª—å—Ç–∞—Ç—ã –∞–Ω–∞–ª–∏–∑–∞

‚Ä¢ `table_chat_ru` ‚Äî RU –¥–∏–∞–ª–æ–≥–∏

‚Ä¢ `table_chat_en` ‚Äî EN –¥–∏–∞–ª–æ–≥–∏



---



### 2Ô∏è‚É£ –ü–æ–¥–∫–ª—é—á–∏—Ç–µ Credentials



**PostgreSQL** ‚Üí –≤—Å–µ —É–∑–ª—ã —Å –∏–∫–æ–Ω–∫–æ–π üêò

**Google Gemini** ‚Üí —É–∑–µ–ª AI Agent



---



### 3Ô∏è‚É£ API Endpoint



| –ú–µ—Ç–æ–¥ | Endpoint | –û–ø–∏—Å–∞–Ω–∏–µ |
|:-----:|----------|----------|
| POST | `/analyze-dialog` | –ê–Ω–∞–ª–∏–∑ –¥–∏–∞–ª–æ–≥–∞ |



**–ü–∞—Ä–∞–º–µ—Ç—Ä—ã –∑–∞–ø—Ä–æ—Å–∞ (body):**
```json
{
  "type": "single" | "all" | "ru" | "en",
  "sessionId": "ID —Å–µ—Å—Å–∏–∏",
  "language": "ru" | "en",
  "userName": "–ò–º—è –ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞—Ç–µ–ª—è"
}
```



---



### 4Ô∏è‚É£ –ê–≤—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏—è –∑–∞–ø—Ä–æ—Å–æ–≤



–ü–µ—Ä–µ–¥–∞–π—Ç–µ API –∫–ª—é—á –æ–¥–Ω–∏–º –∏–∑ —Å–ø–æ—Å–æ–±–æ–≤:

‚Ä¢ Header: `x-api-key: –í–ê–®_–ö–õ–Æ–ß`

‚Ä¢ Query: `?apiKey=–í–ê–®_–ö–õ–Æ–ß`

‚Ä¢ Body: `{"apiKey": "–í–ê–®_–ö–õ–Æ–ß"}`



---



### 5Ô∏è‚É£ –í–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ –∞–Ω–∞–ª–∏–∑–∞



‚Ä¢ üé≠ –≠–º–æ—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã–π —Ç–æ–Ω –¥–∏–∞–ª–æ–≥–∞

‚Ä¢ üéØ –ü–æ—Ç—Ä–µ–±–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ –∫–ª–∏–µ–Ω—Ç–∞

‚Ä¢ üí° –£–ø—É—â–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏

‚Ä¢ üìã –†–µ–∫–æ–º–µ–Ω–¥–∞—Ü–∏–∏ –ø–æ —É–ª—É—á—à–µ–Ω–∏—é

‚Ä¢ üë§ –ò–∑–≤–ª–µ—á–µ–Ω–∏–µ –∫–æ–Ω—Ç–∞–∫—Ç–æ–≤ (NER)

‚Ä¢ üìä BANT –∫–≤–∞–ª–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ü–∏—è

‚Ä¢ üî• Lead Scoring (0-100)



---



### 6Ô∏è‚É£ –ê–∫—Ç–∏–≤–∞—Ü–∏—è



–ù–∞–∂–º–∏—Ç–µ **Active** ‚ÜóÔ∏è –≤ –ø—Ä–∞–≤–æ–º –≤–µ—Ä—Ö–Ω–µ–º —É–≥–ª—É

parameters.query:
-- ‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
-- üîç –ü—Ä–æ–≤–µ—Ä—è–µ–º –µ—Å—Ç—å –ª–∏ –Ω–æ–≤—ã–µ —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏—è –∏ –ø–æ–ª—É—á–∞–µ–º –ø—Ä–µ–¥—ã–¥—É—â–∏–π –∞–Ω–∞–ª–∏–∑
-- –¢–∞–±–ª–∏—Ü—ã: {{ $('‚öôÔ∏è CONFIG').item.json.table_dialog_analysis }},
--          {{ $('‚öôÔ∏è CONFIG').item.json.table_chat_ru }},
--          {{ $('‚öôÔ∏è CONFIG').item.json.table_chat_en }}
-- ‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê

WITH last_analysis AS (
    SELECT 
        session_id,
        created_at as analysis_date,
        emotional_tone,
        customer_needs,
        missed_opportunities,
        recommendations,
        lead_scoring,
        bant_qualification,
        extracted_entities,
        statistics,
        satisfaction_percentage
    FROM {{ $('‚öôÔ∏è CONFIG').item.json.table_dialog_analysis }}
    WHERE session_id = '{{ $('üîÄ Merge with Language').first().json.sessionId }}'
      AND analysis_type = '{{ $('üîÄ Merge with Language').first().json.type }}'
    ORDER BY created_at DESC
    LIMIT 1
),
new_messages AS (
    SELECT COUNT(*) as new_count
    FROM (
        SELECT created_at
        FROM {{ $('‚öôÔ∏è CONFIG').item.json.table_chat_ru }}
        WHERE session_id = '{{ $('üîÄ Merge with Language').first().json.sessionId }}'
          AND created_at > COALESCE((SELECT analysis_date FROM last_analysis), '1970-01-01'::timestamp)
        
        UNION ALL
        
        SELECT created_at
        FROM {{ $('‚öôÔ∏è CONFIG').item.json.table_chat_en }}
        WHERE session_id = '{{ $('üîÄ Merge with Language').first().json.sessionId }}'
          AND created_at > COALESCE((SELECT analysis_date FROM last_analysis), '1970-01-01'::timestamp)
    ) all_new
)
SELECT 
    COALESCE((SELECT new_count FROM new_messages), 0) as new_messages_count,
    CASE 
        WHEN COALESCE((SELECT new_count FROM new_messages), 0) > 0 THEN true 
        ELSE false 
    END as has_new_messages,
    COALESCE((SELECT analysis_date FROM last_analysis), NULL) as last_analysis_date,
    (SELECT emotional_tone FROM last_analysis) as prev_emotional_tone,
    (SELECT customer_needs FROM last_analysis) as prev_customer_needs,
    (SELECT missed_opportunities FROM last_analysis) as prev_missed_opportunities,
    (SELECT recommendations FROM last_analysis) as prev_recommendations,
    (SELECT lead_scoring FROM last_analysis) as prev_lead_scoring,
    (SELECT bant_qualification FROM last_analysis) as prev_bant,
    (SELECT extracted_entities FROM last_analysis) as prev_entities,
    (SELECT statistics FROM last_analysis) as prev_statistics,
    (SELECT satisfaction_percentage FROM last_analysis) as prev_satisfaction;

-- ‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
-- üìã –ü–æ–ª—É—á–∞–µ–º —Å—É—â–µ—Å—Ç–≤—É—é—â–∏–π –∞–Ω–∞–ª–∏–∑ (–Ω–µ—Ç –Ω–æ–≤—ã—Ö —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏–π)
-- –¢–∞–±–ª–∏—Ü–∞: {{ $('‚öôÔ∏è CONFIG').item.json.table_dialog_analysis }}
-- ‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê

SELECT 
    session_id,
    user_name,
    analysis_type,
    language,
    platform,
    extracted_entities,
    bant_qualification,
    emotional_tone,
    lead_scoring,
    statistics,
    customer_needs,
    missed_opportunities,
    recommendations,
    satisfaction_percentage,
    created_at
FROM {{ $('‚öôÔ∏è CONFIG').item.json.table_dialog_analysis }}
WHERE session_id = '{{ $('üîÄ Merge Check Data').first().json.sessionId }}'
  AND analysis_type = '{{ $('üîÄ Merge Check Data').first().json.type }}'
ORDER BY created_at DESC
LIMIT 1;

-- ‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
-- üí¨ –ü–æ–ª—É—á–∞–µ–º –¥–∏–∞–ª–æ–≥ –∫–æ–Ω–∫—Ä–µ—Ç–Ω–æ–≥–æ –ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞—Ç–µ–ª—è
-- –¢–∞–±–ª–∏—Ü—ã: {{ $('‚öôÔ∏è CONFIG').item.json.table_chat_ru }},
--          {{ $('‚öôÔ∏è CONFIG').item.json.table_chat_en }}
-- ‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê

WITH all_chats AS (
    SELECT 
        id,
        session_id,
        message::json->>'type' as message_type,
        message::json->>'content' as content,
        created_at as timestamp,
        platform,
        'ru' as language
    FROM {{ $('‚öôÔ∏è CONFIG').item.json.table_chat_ru }}
    WHERE session_id = '{{ $('üîÄ Merge Check Data').first().json.sessionId }}'
      AND created_at >= NOW() - INTERVAL '30 days'
    
    UNION ALL
    
    SELECT 
        id,
        session_id,
        message::json->>'type' as message_type,
        message::json->>'content' as content,
        created_at as timestamp,
        platform,
        'en' as language
    FROM {{ $('‚öôÔ∏è CONFIG').item.json.table_chat_en }}
    WHERE session_id = '{{ $('üîÄ Merge Check Data').first().json.sessionId }}'
      AND created_at >= NOW() - INTERVAL '30 days'
)
SELECT 
    *,
    '{{ $('üîÄ Merge Check Data').first().json.last_analysis_date }}' as last_analysis_date
FROM all_chats
ORDER BY timestamp ASC;

-- ‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
-- üí¨ –ü–æ–ª—É—á–∞–µ–º –≤—Å–µ –¥–∏–∞–ª–æ–≥–∏ –∏–ª–∏ –ø–æ —è–∑—ã–∫—É –∑–∞ –ø–æ—Å–ª–µ–¥–Ω–∏–µ 30 –¥–Ω–µ–π
-- –¢–∞–±–ª–∏—Ü—ã: {{ $('‚öôÔ∏è CONFIG').item.json.table_chat_ru }},
--          {{ $('‚öôÔ∏è CONFIG').item.json.table_chat_en }}
-- ‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê

{{ $('üîÄ Merge Check Data').first().json.type === 'all' ? 
`WITH all_chats AS (
    SELECT * FROM (
        SELECT 
            id,
            session_id,
            message::json->>'type' as message_type,
            message::json->>'content' as content,
            created_at as timestamp,
            platform,
            'ru' as language
        FROM ${$('‚öôÔ∏è CONFIG').item.json.table_chat_ru}
        WHERE created_at >= NOW() - INTERVAL '30 days'
        
        UNION ALL
        
        SELECT 
            id,
            session_id,
            message::json->>'type' as message_type,
            message::json->>'content' as content,
            created_at as timestamp,
            platform,
            'en' as language
        FROM ${$('‚öôÔ∏è CONFIG').item.json.table_chat_en}
        WHERE created_at >= NOW() - INTERVAL '30 days'
    ) combined
    ORDER BY session_id, timestamp
)
SELECT *, '${$('üîÄ Merge Check Data').first().json.last_analysis_date}' as last_analysis_date FROM all_chats;`
:
`SELECT 
    id,
    session_id,
    message::json->>'type' as message_type,
    message::json->>'content' as content,
    created_at as timestamp,
    platform,
    '${$('üîÄ Merge Check Data').first().json.language}' as language,
    '${$('üîÄ Merge Check Data').first().json.last_analysis_date}' as last_analysis_date
FROM ${$('‚öôÔ∏è CONFIG').item.json['table_chat_' + $('üîÄ Merge Check Data').first().json.language]}
WHERE created_at >= NOW() - INTERVAL '30 days'
ORDER BY session_id, timestamp;`
}}

-- ‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
-- üíæ –°–æ—Ö—Ä–∞–Ω–µ–Ω–∏–µ —Ä–µ–∑—É–ª—å—Ç–∞—Ç–æ–≤ –∞–Ω–∞–ª–∏–∑–∞ –≤ –ë–î
-- –¢–∞–±–ª–∏—Ü–∞: {{ $('‚öôÔ∏è CONFIG').first().json.table_dialog_analysis }}
-- ‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê

INSERT INTO {{ $('‚öôÔ∏è CONFIG').first().json.table_dialog_analysis }} (
    session_id, 
    user_name, 
    analysis_type, 
    language, 
    platform,
    extracted_entities,
    bant_qualification,
    emotional_tone, 
    lead_scoring,
    statistics,
    customer_needs, 
    missed_opportunities, 
    recommendations,
    satisfaction_percentage,
    created_at
) VALUES (
    '{{ $json.session_id }}', 
    '{{ $json.user_name }}', 
    '{{ $json.analysis_type }}',
    '{{ $json.language }}', 
    '{{ $json.platform }}',
    '{{ JSON.stringify($json.extracted_entities).replace(/'/g, "''") }}'::jsonb,
    '{{ JSON.stringify($json.bant_qualification).replace(/'/g, "''") }}'::jsonb,
    '{{ JSON.stringify($json.emotional_tone).replace(/'/g, "''") }}'::jsonb,
    '{{ JSON.stringify($json.lead_scoring).replace(/'/g, "''") }}'::jsonb,
    '{{ JSON.stringify($json.statistics).replace(/'/g, "''") }}'::jsonb,
    ARRAY[{{ $json.customer_needs.map(item => `'${String(item).replace(/'/g, "''")}'`).join(", ") }}]::text[],
    ARRAY[{{ $json.missed_opportunities.map(item => `'${String(item).replace(/'/g, "''")}'`).join(", ") }}]::text[],
    ARRAY[{{ $json.recommendations.map(item => `'${String(item).replace(/'/g, "''")}'`).join(", ") }}]::text[],
    {{ $json.satisfaction_percentage || 0 }},
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
)
ON CONFLICT (session_id, analysis_type) 
DO UPDATE SET
    user_name = EXCLUDED.user_name,
    language = EXCLUDED.language,
    platform = EXCLUDED.platform,
    extracted_entities = EXCLUDED.extracted_entities,
    bant_qualification = EXCLUDED.bant_qualification,
    emotional_tone = EXCLUDED.emotional_tone,
    lead_scoring = EXCLUDED.lead_scoring,
    statistics = EXCLUDED.statistics,
    customer_needs = EXCLUDED.customer_needs,
    missed_opportunities = EXCLUDED.missed_opportunities,
    recommendations = EXCLUDED.recommendations,
    satisfaction_percentage = EXCLUDED.satisfaction_percentage,
    created_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
RETURNING *;
